text: @jack “Disputed?” “Incorrect?” Where were your “fact-checkers” during the Russian lies? Where ARE they when they assert as FACT that @realDonaldTrump killed 100,000 Americans by mismanaging the response to #COVID19; that he advocated drinking bleach? #ShameOnYouJack
